rules_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each land you control.
Conceive 0–{5}{G}{G} [i]({5}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a 0/0 colorless Elemental creature token, then create a token that's a copy of this card attached to it. Conceive only as a sorcery.)[/i]
